info.name: Restore normal font sizes (undo giant text)
info.description: Brings back normal font sizes in articles and forums, because nowadays many use ridiculously large sizes. Works on most sites (not just the example one).

style.css:
@-moz-document regexp("https?:\/\/.+\/.*[0-9]+[\/\-][0-9]+\/.*"), regexp("https?:\/\/.+\/.*(article|news|story|wiki|threads)\/.*"), regexp("https?:\/\/(?:forums?\.).+\/[A-Za-z0-9]+\-[A-Za-z0-9]+.*\/?"), regexp("https?:\/\/.+news\..+\/.+"), regexp("https?:\/\/.+\/.*(?:[A-Za-z0-9]+\-){3,}.*"), regexp("https?:\/\/.+\/(?:forums|questions|docs|blog)?\/.+"), regexp("https?:\/\/forums?\..+") {
[class*=blog-body],
[class*=field-name-body], 
#content p,
#content li,
.entry-content p,
article:not([class*="message"]) p, article:not([class*="message"]) li,
article .message-body,
div[id*="post_message"] blockquote,
div[class*="post-content"] p,
div[class*="post-body"] p, div[class*="post-body"] span,
.maincontent .content,
[id*="content"] p,
[id*="content"] p span,
[id*="maincontent"] p,
.main p,
div[class*="storyContent"] p, div[class*="storyContent"] li,
div[class="Article"] p, div[class="Article"] li,
div[class="article"] p, div[class="article"] li,
div[class*="article-"] p, div[class="article-"] li,
div[class*="rticle_"] p, div[class="rticle-"] li,
div[class="article__body"] p, div[class="article__body"] li,
div[class*="ArticleBody"] p, div[class*="ArticleBody"] li,
div[class*="articleBody"] p, div[class*="articleBody"] li,
div[class*="story-body"] p, div[class*="story-body"] li,
div[class*="storyBody"] p, div[class*="storyBody"] li,
#article p, #article li,
#bodyContent p, #bodyContent li,
#bodyContainer p, #bodyContainer li,
div[class*="content-body"],
section[class*="content-body"],
div[class*="paragraph"],
div[class*="Paragraph__"],
p[class*="story-text__paragraph"],
div[class*="body-text"],
p[class*="body-text"],
h2[class*="subhead"]
{
    font-size: /*[[body_size]]*/px!important;
    font-family: sans-serif!important;
    line-height: 1.5em!important;
    margin-bottom: 1em!important;
    margin-top: 0!important;
}


.content h4 {
    font-size: 15px!important;
    line-height: 1.0em!important;
}

div[class*="headline"] h1,
h1[class*="headline"],
h1[class*="-title"],
h1[class*="_title"],
div[class*="articleHead"] h1,
div[class*="pageHead"] h1,
div[id*="content"] h1,
header :not([class*="message"]) h2,
article:not([class*="message"]) h1
{
    font-size: /*[[title_size]]*/px!important;
    line-height: 1.0em!important;
}
}
